      • appendDamage

        public void appendDamage(Player player,
                         boolean canRealizeMarks)
                  throws DamageTrackFullException
        Description copied from interface: DamageBoard
        Adds a damage from the given player to the damage board. This also resolves any leftovers marks from the given Player if applicable.
        Specified by:
        appendDamage in interface DamageBoard
        Throws:
        DamageTrackFullException - if the damage board is full and no other damage is allowed to be added.
